# WOD Brains

WOD Brains is a workout timer generator that turns workouts into smart timers.

## What it does
- Accepts workout descriptions via text, URL, or image
- Parses workout structure (rounds, intervals, exercises)
- Generates smart timers with automatic counting, splits, and cues

## Key pages
- / - Create a timer (paste workout, drop image, or URL)
- /about - About WOD Brains
- /workouts - Saved workouts
- /w/{id} - View/start a saved workout timer
- /r/{id} - Active timer session

## API
POST /api/parse - Parse workout text/image into timer structure
